altername_name: Demon From The Darkside III: The Final Conflict
name: The Devils Hand
overview: The Devil's Hand is a text adventure (with graphics) for the ZX Spectrum it was developed and published by Compass Software in 1988. It is part of the "Demon Quadrilogy" which also includes 1986's Demon from the Darkside, 1987's The Golden Mask, and 1990's Shadows of the Past. The game is also known as Demon From The Darkside III: The Final Conflict as it was originally just supposed to be a trilogy, but ended up with the fourth game in 1990.
